## Data
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
data <- read_excel("data.xlsx", range = "A1:G261")

df <- data %>%
  group_by(season) %>%
  mutate(relative_revenue = revenue / mean(revenue)) %>%
  mutate(relative_wage = wage / mean(wage)) %>%
  ungroup()

```
